name: Rognoid
description:
A retro-style block breaker game with roguelite elements: make your way to the final boss, unlocking new weapons and powers in each run!

Developer: https://nicobertoli.itch.io/

Music: https://www.youtube.com/c/CodyO%E2%80%99Quinn

Boss assets: https://vryell.itch.io/

Slime asset: https://parabellum-games.itch.io/
